review: I'm returning this item because it is awkward using in on my 2008 Toshiba TV with only 2 HDMI plugs on the back.  After 3 uses, I'm unable to get a signal even when I plug the device directly into the TV Port.  It worked very well when I get it to work but it takes several off/on attempts to get the device to kick in.
author: W R Allen

review: I purchased the Amazon Fire TV Stick to stream Amazon Prime and Netflix content after discovering that my 2011 Samsung Blu-ray player could not stream Amazon Prime (too old, I guess?).  The Fire TV Stick is so easy to set up, the remote is simple, and the on-screen menu is easy to navigate.  It has worked flawlessly and the content loads so much faster than my old Blu-ray player.  This is a great option to stream content inexpensively, without needing a gaming system or any other more expensive device.
author: Jean
